entry.title: R语言资料收集
entry.content: 博士课题R语言学习资料R语言 数据挖掘-文本分析(2)https://www.jianshu.com/p/3742d86fc3a8Text Mining with R A Tidy Approach (for Chinese Text)https://text-mining-with-r-a-tidy-approach.netlify.com/結合jiebar與Tidy text套件，處理中文文字資料http://rstudio-pubs-static.s3.amazonaws.com/480176_a93ec4f372774fdb85c1eda7b5b99706.htmlError in .M.kind(x) : not yet implemented for matrix with typeof NULLhttps://github.com/juliasilge/tidytext/issues/126R语言教程http://www.math.pku.edu.cn/teachers/lidf/docs/Rbook/html/_Rbook/index.htmlText mining and word cloud fundamentals in R : 5 simple steps you should knowhttp://www.sthda.com/english/wiki/text-mining-and-word-cloud-fundamentals-in-r-5-simple-steps-you-should-knowText Mining with R A Tidy Approachhttps://www.tidytextmining.com/R语言关联规则可视化：扩展包arulesViz的介绍https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1058422Market Basket Analysis using Rhttps://www.datacamp.com/community/tutorials/market-basket-analysis-rR入门？从Tidyverse学起！https://www.jianshu.com/p/2f64289b0c0f初学者学习tidyversehttps://www.jianshu.com/p/f3c21a5ad10a用关联规则来分析移动端用户行为数据（R语言）https://www.jianshu.com/p/23a684ce8740showtext：字体，好玩的字体和好玩的图形https://cosx.org/2014/01/showtext-interesting-fonts-and-graphs/ggplot2条形图添加数据标签https://www.jianshu.com/p/3fa92a2391da手把手教你使用ggplot2绘制条形图https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/25173606R|ggplot2(一)|一个完整的绘图流程https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/27009299可能是目前最好的词云解决方案 wordcloud2https://cosx.org/2016/08/wordcloud2/关联规则R语言实战（Apriori算法）https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?src=11&timestamp=1577458948&ver=2060signature=KuZfTX4FZjFGmCpEjzGdxXTPWQjKwS8j3pbDoJ893q*mCCt9IwKLz3TNqJJf1jmnlC5UAihd-IJVObwurvDOtIKWjA0IbsadxtwxwSJlq4AHrT5I92SEMIs9H03pd5Ru&new=1《医用数据挖掘与R软件》第四讲：关联规则与贝叶斯网络构建https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?src=3&timestamp=1577458948&ver=1&signature=yWklXdpoUYqVsB059TvU5kYA60z5YvCny4P1RUlyqaaqRx5yC4B97ynicttJ3HldXGMJDOSiwNU3ZzHRyacJfgbO-32NpJEWWRkEsmLYvMqaFYjKi7I1YvJXhRSG*f-mkWFNc4CmwGyU35GqCaF4i9WMW7cZ3QH6Mjay99KqRsQ=如何用R语言实现关联分析，实例讲解，要不要来试https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?src=3&timestamp=1577463345&ver=1&signature=mPVOF3R4tcsLs1L1Phi9*juQlHCeGtA4kbe8bgSyrJVxwHxFbitX8g0sISegAR1BEAHjb7VbiF6HMXYIXiBxgDaR*v5pG1F9t5MMFCmbnlKJ4Zc0rSW2i*MN-kmq8jSdAXIgNN5Ve6swSyTIPoEOukySwIHTCTpfHw3Z1g7wJWY=用关联规则来分析移动端用户行为数据(去冗余)https://www.jianshu.com/p/23a684ce8740关联规则及可视化https://rpubs.com/Jiahui_Chen/21753Publish Your Data(保存带中文的cytoscape图片)http://manual.cytoscape.org/en/3.3/Publish_Your_Data.htmlcsv 文件打开乱码，有哪些方法可以解决https://www.zhihu.com/question/21869078

entry.title: markdown使用教程
entry.content: R MarkdownThis is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. 学习过程中收集的网络资源在学习markdown过程中收集了很多网络资源，有王诗翔的简书,https://www.jianshu.com/p/a592caee9774markdown基本语法https://www.jianshu.com/p/191d1e21f7edW3Cschool网站上有很多资源https://www.w3cschool.cn/markdownyfsm/Markdown Here Cheatsheethttps://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Here-Cheatsheet感谢前辈的经验分享，使得后来者能少走很多弯路。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
